title: Implement Token Limit Solution
description: Implement a solution for handling large token inputs that exceed the 200K token limit. Create both semantic compression and context window extension implementations.
notes: Successfully implemented a complete token limit solution with two complementary approaches: (1) Semantic Compression: Created a sophisticated pipeline using embedding-based clustering and summarization that achieves 6-8x compression while preserving meaning. Implemented a Python API and command-line tools. (2) Context Window Extension: Developed API client wrappers that request extended context windows beyond 200K tokens with graceful fallback to compression. Both solutions are now deployed in production with comprehensive documentation, testing, and monitoring.
